DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety effectiveness surgical versus conservative management type II odontoid fracture among patient > /= 65 year age . Of secondary interest determine difference outcomes anterior screw fixation posterior fusion fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Surgical Conservative Management Treatment Type II Odontoid Fractures Among Elderly
